title: Outsiders
desc:
- <:outsiders:1108173904062722118> can only be played on colors other than <:wild:1106237191388143838> or <:rgby:1107167371048788028>.
- <:outsiders:1108173904062722118>, instead of going on the stack (play pile), enter the "Global Statuses" zone.
- <:outsiders:1108173904062722118> must have a condition to be removed.
- If two <:outsiders:1108173904062722118> would break the game if played at the same time for some reason, the host can nullify the effect of the most recently played <:outsiders:1108173904062722118>, and it's instead played as a dead card.
